Jason’s Setup 

Create a new test box.
Goto https://openhouse.corp.yahoo.com/project
Images > v-4-16-50 > launch
Wait 10 minutes…
Copy formlukewarm.corp.ne1.yahoo.com

Connect to test box.
Open terminal
yinit
ssh -A formlukewarm.corp.ne1.yahoo.com

Run Bootstrap & test box environment setup
git clone git@partner.git.corp.yahoo.com:Edge/build.git
cd build
git checkout release_master
. bootstrap.sh 
sudo yum install devtoolset-6

. /opt/rh/devtoolset-6/enable 

. /opt/rh/httpd24/enable


. /opt/rh/rh-python35/enable

make build

make test



While that is running install VSCode on your Mac. 
https://code.visualstudio.com/
Welcome > Clone Git repo… > 
	~/yts 
	https://partner.git.corp.yahoo.com/Edge/trafficserver.git
View > extensions > install c++, and rsync.

Tell Rsync to push changes to your test box.
Explorer > yts > trafficserver > .vscode > settings.json : add 
{
	"sync-rsync.remote": "formlukewarm.corp.ne1.yahoo.com:~/build/trafficserver",
   	"sync-rsync.onSave": true,
	"sync-rsync.exclude": [".vscode"]
}	

Edit and Test Code changes
Make test

VSCode - Edit code locally

cd trafficserver

autoconf -if

./configure --enable-layout=Yahoo --prefix="/home/acanary/test_install" --disable-curl --enable-experimental-plugins --with-openssl=/opt/yahoo/openssl/1.0.2k CFLAGS="-ggdb -O2" LDFLAGS="-Wl,--add-needed -L/home/y/lib64 -Wl,-rpath,/home/y/lib64"
make all
sudo make install
sudo ./tests/autest.sh --ats-bin /home/acanary/test_install/bin64 --sandbox /home/acanary/sb



Create fork on git.com
Cherry pick your branch
push
Pull request from git.com

If all pass
